query: "How is my anxiety level as measured by the GAD-7 score on December 29, 2020, compared to my respiratory rate from December 28, 2020?"
resource_summaries: This record is an Observation of a patient's Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7 item (GAD-7) total score, with a value of 6, conducted on December 29, 2020.
answer: Based on the information in your medical record, your GAD-7 score on December 29, 2020, was 6, indicating a mild level of anxiety. Unfortunately, there is no information provided about your respiratory rate from December 28, 2020, to compare it with your anxiety level.
